item.title: My First Century Ride - Mount Hamilton Loop
item.description: How time flies! It has been almost a year since I started cycling. Last year(2012), I have accomplished several long rides(100k). Since then I have always been thinking to chanllenge myself to do a century, a 100-mile long ride. However, it is hard to find a 100-mile route in the Bay Area that I can do it by myself alone. Several months ago, a cycling friend hosted a event to visit San Antonio Valley wildflowers in this Spring(info).
